footer.prefooterTitle: © Finteria, 2023 — Single Entry to Crypto Market
footer.postfooter: This website services are not available to residents of the EEA countries, USA, and UK.
footer.disclaimer: Risk Warning: Trading Leveraged Financial Instruments involves significant risk and can result in the loss of your invested capital. You should not invest more than you can afford to lose and should ensure that you fully understand the risks involved. Trading leveraged products may not be suitable for all investors. Trading non-leveraged products such as forex also involves risk as the value of an asset can fall as well as rise, which could mean getting back less than you originally put in. Past performance is no guarantee of future results. Before trading, please take into consideration your level of experience, investment objectives and seek independent financial advice if necessary. It is the responsibility of the client to assess whether he/she is permitted to use the services of the Finteria brand based on the legal requirements in his/her country of residence.

verification.signAcceptanceTitle: To start trading, sign an acceptance of service
verification.signAcceptanceDescription: The financial services provided by this website carry a high level of risk and can result in the loss of all of your funds. You should never invest money that you cannot afford to lose. Please ensure you read our terms and conditions before making any operation in our trading platform. Under no circumstances the company has any liability to any person or entity for any loss or damage caused by operations on this website. Finteria nor its agents or partners are not registered and do not provide any services on the USA territory.

authentication.enableAuthText: For your security, we strongly recommend enabling 2FA on your account. After that, you will need to enter a one-time 6-digit code each time you are logging into your account, withdrawing funds or changing the password.
authentication.download2faAppText: You should download and install an authenticator application, such as Google Authenticator or Authy, on your mobile device. This app will generate one-time 6- digit access codes, which are required for logging into your account.
authentication.save2faBackupKey: Save 2FA Backup Key and Scan QR Code
authentication.save2faBackupKeyText: Please, backup your 2FA recovery key to some offline storage, i.e., write down on a paper. If your mobile device gets lost, stolen or erased, you will need this key to recover your 2FA access.
authentication.backupSecretKeyText: Please, write down or print a copy of the key above and store it safely.

settings.dataUpdated: Your personal data has been updated

landingPreview.title: Get Instant Crypto Loans
landingPreview.subtitle: Use the TOP 20 coins as collateral for crypto loans with the highest loan to value ratio (90%). Get loans in EUR, USD, CHF and GBP and withdraw instantly to credit card and bank account.

infoBlock.title: How crypto backed loans work

left_items.title: Transfer crypto to your Finteria wallet
left_items.text: Finteria accepts the TOP 20 cryptocurrencies as collateral. No fees for crypto deposits or withdrawals.

left_items.title: Get your crypto collateral back anytime
left_items.text: You can repay your loan using a credit card, stablecoins or bank account and get your crypto back. You can keep your crypto assets in Finteria's wallet and have instant access to crypto loans.

left_items.title: Get a crypto loan and withdraw funds
left_items.text: Your loan approval take seconds. No need to find a lender like in peer-to-peer (p2p) platforms. You instantly receive cash in EUR, USD, USDT or BTC. Finteria works like a pawnshop. There is a temporary sale of cryptocurrency, where YOU are the seller and Finteria is the buyer. At any moment, you can repurchase the cryptocurrency from Finteria.

right_items: Bank wire withdrawal via SEPA and SWIFT. Available worldwide.
Credit card withdrawal to your MasterCard or VISA.
Crypto withdrawal: buy any crypto or stablecoins using our integrated crypto exchange.

helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.text: Getting started with Finteria is easy. But for those of you who are a bit unsure, we have plenty of instructional posts and helpful hints on how to manage assets in a safe & smart way.

accordions.title: How to buy crypto?
accordions.text: To buy crypto, go to your wallet and deposit funds via credit card or bank account. Once funds are received, they become available in your wallet and you can buy crypto with your fiat.

accordions.title: How can I get a loan?
accordions.text:
Getting a loan is easy and straight-forward. Just deposit crypto to your wallet and initiate a loan contract. 
Your loan approval take seconds. You instantly receive cash in EUR, USD, USDT or BTC. You can repurchase the cryptocurrency from Finteria later at any time.

accordions.title: What currencies are available for exchange?
accordions.text: Finteria supports 20+ cryptocurrencies for exchange, borrowing and earning. The list of available coins and tokens is updated on a regular basis.

accordions.title: Are there any withdrawal fees?
accordions.text: There are no withthdawal fees for fiat currencies. The fees for crypto withdrawals depend on network fees and the current state of the blockchain network.

landingPreview.title: Earn Crypto with TOP staking and lending platforms
landingPreview.subtitle: Earn interest and staking rewards on DeFi and third-party centralized platforms. Turn your cold assets into hot profit instantly by depositing crypto in your Finteria wallet and start getting daily interest payments.

infoBlock.title: How crypto saving account work?

left_items.title: Deposit crypto to your Finteria wallet
left_items.text: Finteria accepts the TOP 20 cryptocurrencies. No fees for crypto deposits or withdrawals.

left_items.title: Instruct Finteria to transfer your crypto to DeFi or staking platform
left_items.text: Choose a crypto reward program and start earning while holding your crypto tokens on your individual wallet.

left_items.title: Earn compounding rewards every day
left_items.text: Your saving program approval takes seconds. You start instantly earning compounding rewards on your crypto tokens.

right_items: You can release your funds any time and you will receive earned interest in full.
Each additional crypto transfer to saving account, will create a separate staking or borrow contract.
Your are free to keep your accumulated interest to earn even more profit.

landingPreview.title: Finteria NO FEE crypto exchange
landingPreview.subtitle: Instant cryptocurrency exchange with no fees. Exchange crypto, stablecoins and fiat such as BTC, ETH, USD, etc. Buy Bitcoins with credit card.

infoBlock.title: How crypto exchange works

left_items.title: Deposit Crypto
left_items.text: Finteria accepts the TOP 20 cryptocurrencies. No fees for crypto deposits or withdrawals.

left_items.title: Exchange for Fiat or Crypto
left_items.text: You can easily exchange fiat and crypto assets with low fees and withdraw funds to your card, bank account or wallet.

right_items: Finteria is a safe and regulated platform for buying, selling, or storing cryptocurrencies.
The exchange rate is updated every second following crypto market, so you receive an instant insight into the price ratio.
We charge no fee for crypto to crypto exchange.
You can buy the major cryptocurrencies at the current exchange rate using your VISA/MASTERCARD.

helpCenter.title: Getting started with Finteria is easy
helpCenter.text: But for those of you who are a bit unsure, we have plenty of instructional posts and helpful hints on how to start trading

accordions.title: How much money do I need to start?
accordions.text: The minimum initial deposit is ${m$sg} or equivalent in another currency.

accordions.title: How can I deposit?
accordions.text: There are several deposit methods available depending on your location. The deposit methods include crypto, VISA/Mastercard cards, and other electronic payment systems. Check your Client Area for more information on available deposit methods.

accordions.title: What instruments can I trade?
accordions.text: Finteria offers over 100+ trading instruments including Crypto, Forex, CFDs, and Commodities.

accordions.title: Which platform can I use?
accordions.text: You can use Finteria Trader. The platform is available for both desktop and mobile devices, allowing users to access it anytime, anywhere.

accordions.title: Do I pay commissions?
accordions.text: Finteria offers trading with zero commissions.

accordions.title: What are withdrawal fees?
accordions.text: There are no withthdawal fees for fiat currencies. The fees for crypto withdrawals depend on network fees and the current state of the blockchain network.

list.title: Trading Blog
list.lead: Explore the Finteria blog for the latest hot topics in trading. Get insights, updates, news and more from a team of experts at Finteria.

cryptocurrency.title: Cryptocurrency trading
cryptocurrency.lead: With Finteria you can trade a variety of cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana and more.
cryptocurrency.description1: Experience rapid access to the global cryptocurrency market, trade a wide range of popular crypto-assets and tokens, and elevate your trading outcomes with our renowned platform.
cryptocurrency.description2: At Finteria, we offer a robust trading infrastructure, dependable software, and a user-friendly interface tailored for the cryptocurrency realm. With our advanced traditional trading tools, you can confidently trade top cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, Litecoin, and beyond.
cryptocurrency.tradingSectionTitle: Unlock the potential of cryptocurrency trading
cryptocurrency.tradingSectionText: Cryptocurrency trading offers immense profit potential with its volatile and rapidly fluctuating nature. Prices of digital assets can experience significant swings, often rising or falling by as much as 20% within a single day or over the course of a week.

tradingCheckList.title: High profit potential
tradingCheckList.text: Traders choose cryptocurrencies because of higher volatility and increased potential profits on successful trades.

tradingCheckList.title: Most popular digital assets
tradingCheckList.text: Finteria offers Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and Litecoin – the most popular cryptocurrencies in the market.

tradingCheckList.title: Secure trading
tradingCheckList.text: Traders can protect their positions against extreme market volatility by using protection orders, and have peace of mind while trading on a secure platform.

whyFinteriaCheckList.title: Deep liquidity, powerful tools
whyFinteriaCheckList.text: Trade cryptocurrencies with our fast, secure and reliable platform. Benefit from deep liquidity, and a wide range of advanced features and trading tools.

whyFinteriaCheckList.title: Competitive fee schedule
whyFinteriaCheckList.text: Enjoy some of the best trading conditions on the market with tight spreads and low fees on all cryptocurrency trades.

whyFinteriaCheckList.title: Intuitive, user-friendly trading
whyFinteriaCheckList.text: Customize your trading interface with features like multi-monitor functionality, a range of professional trading tools, and 24/7 customer service.

whyFinteriaCheckList.title: Advanced charting tools
whyFinteriaCheckList.text: Experience a range of different chart types, over 50+ trading indicators, and the ability to execute trades directly from charts.

stepList.title: Register
stepList.text: Create a new account on FInteria in less than a minute. Only a registered E-mail is needed to begin.

stepList.title: Fund your account
stepList.text: Deposit funds into your personal wallet. Once your account is funded, you’re ready to trade!

stepList.title: Begin trading
stepList.text: Get full access to our award-winning trading software. Benefit from low fees and advanced trading features

forex.title: Forex trading
forex.lead: With Finteria you can buy, sell, and trade a variety of forex currencies such as EURUSD, USDJPY, GBPUSD and more.
forex.description1: Experience rapid access to the global Forex market, trade a wide range of popular currency pairs, and elevate your trading outcomes with our renowned platform.
forex.description2: At Finteria, we offer a robust trading infrastructure, dependable software, and a user-friendly interface tailored for the currency realm. With our advanced traditional trading tools, you can confidently trade top currencies the Dollar, the Euro, the British Pound, the Japanese Yen, and beyond.
forex.tradingSectionTitle: Unlock the potential of forex trading
forex.tradingSectionText: Forex trading offers immense profit potential with its volatile and rapidly fluctuating nature. Prices of currencies can experience significant swings due to economic and political events.

tradingCheckList.title: High profit potential
tradingCheckList.text: Traders choose Forex because of higher liquidity and increased potential profits on successful trades.

tradingCheckList.title: Most popular forex currencies
tradingCheckList.text: Finteria offers the most popular currency pairs in the market.

tradingCheckList.title: Secure trading
tradingCheckList.text: Traders can protect their positions against extreme market volatility by using protection orders, and have peace of mind while trading on a secure platform.

whyFinteriaCheckList.title: Deep liquidity, powerful tools
whyFinteriaCheckList.text: Trade Forex with our fast, secure and reliable platform. Benefit from deep liquidity, and a wide range of advanced features and trading tools.

whyFinteriaCheckList.title: Competitive fee schedule
whyFinteriaCheckList.text: Enjoy some of the best trading conditions on the market with tight spreads and low fees on all trades.

whyFinteriaCheckList.title: Intuitive, user-friendly trading
whyFinteriaCheckList.text: Customize your trading interface with features like multi-monitor functionality, a range of professional trading tools, and 24/7 customer service.

whyFinteriaCheckList.title: Advanced charting tools
whyFinteriaCheckList.text: Experience a range of different chart types, over 50+ trading indicators, and the ability to execute trades directly from charts.

markets.title: price for today
markets.chartText: Follow this real-time price chart to speculate on the price movements. With this convenient live chart, you can view the current price, analyze the price dynamics, trace historical exchange rates.

currency.title: Currency Strength
currency.lead: Currency Strength is a tool that helps you find the strongest and the weakest currencies in the market. By combining strong and weak currencies, you can discover new trading ideas at any given moment. You can also see new tendencies in the market and correlation between different instruments.

crypto.title: Crypto Strength
crypto.lead: Crypto Strength is a tool that helps you see how cryptocurrencies performs across all top-10 major crypto currencies. It helps to evaluate the overall performance of the crypto market as well as see how different cryptocurrencies perform in relation to each other. You can easily identify the strongest and weakest cryptocurrencies among top-10 coins.

leaders.title: Leaders
leaders.text: Join our weekly Trading Contest and put your skills to the test! Trade, compete, and have fun as you climb the leaderboard for rewards.

accordions.title: How to take part in the contest?
accordions.text: All live accounts participate in the contest automatically. No additional registration is necessary.

accordions.title: How the winning places are distributed?
accordions.text: The places are distributed based on the number of trades during the contest period. The more trades you have, the higher is your ranking. If you have several accounts, all trades from all accounts are taken into account. Demo accounts are not included.

accordions.title: What are the prizes for this contest?
accordions.text: All prizes are bonus deposits which are credited to winners. To get a prize, your net balance (balance minus bonuses) should be equal or more than the prize amount. For example, if your prize is 500 USD, the net balance of your account needs to be at least 500 USD.

accordions.title: How will I know if I won a prize?
accordions.text: You will be notified by email about your place and the prize you won. Also you can always check your rank in the leader board.

accordions.title: Can I withdraw the prize from the account?
accordions.text: As the prize is credited as a bonus deposit, you can't withdraw it. However, you can withdraw the profits if the minimum turnover conditions are met. The turnover requirement is 3x the sum of all deposits and bonuses.
